name: Astral Beings
description:
You fell deep into a dream and followed a mystical voice to find the true form of your astral being. How would you look like? Would your astral form be reminiscent of something from your real life?

Inspired by constellations, dreams and the galaxy, we made this game to help the player re-imagine themselves through audio, shapes and forms.

Screen shot will be saved in game folder.
